question:
Here $ represent the - operator (subtraction)
so X - X = 0 first condition
X $ (Y $ Z) = X - (Y - Z) = X - Y+ Z
It can be written as X $ Y + Z
Example: 2012 - 0 + 2012 - 1912 = 2112
Find the greatest number that will divide 148 246 and 623 leaving remainders 4 6 and 11 respectively?
What is the highest divider of 40 from below options?
